column2: (let* ((base (make-temp-file "neovm-make-directory-" t)) (d1 (expand-file-name "a/b" base)) (d2 (expand-file-name "c" base))) (prog1 (list (condition-case err (make-directory d1) (error (car err))) (make-directory d1 t) (file-directory-p d1) (make-directory d2) (file-directory-p d2)) (delete-directory base t)))
